name: DOS Galaxy
description:
DOS Galaxy is a text-based adventure game about making your way through space via a command line-style interface, with random events, realtime combat, side quests, ship upgrades, and synthy sci-fi vibes all playing out from the comfort of your ship's control terminal.

This game was  developed in two weeks for the 2022 Adventure Jam, with programming, design, text, and UI by Doubleday; text and design by Jonas Tintenseher; and music by Andrew G.
